claim_summary: Arkansas Act 890 of 2025 contains FY2026 DHS Division of Aging, Adult, and Behavioral Health Services (DAABHS) appropriations, including items referenced in-thread such as Substance Abuse Prevention and Alcohol and Drug Abuse Coordinating Council state funds line-items.
